reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the second part (8 nights) of our honeymoon at the Pavilions and, after being spoilt rotten at the Uma in Ubud (see review) for the previous four days, we hoped that Pavilions would be just as nice - we weren't disappointed!
reviews.title: Fabulous honeymoon at Pavilions!!

likes.liked: — The villa was gorgeous, and the staff were excellent
likes.disliked: — Could have been a little quieter in the mornings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You know you're in for a treat when your driver turns off the busy Sanur road and you are suddently in a bamboo-lined driveway taking you a world away from the hustle and bustle and into the peace and tranquility of the hotel grounds.
reviews.title: The Perfect Honeymoon & Best Holiday Ever!

likes.liked: — It felt like your own home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having transferred from within Bali we arrived before check-in time (2pm), but were only kept waiting for 10 minutes before being shown to our pool villa (# 11, recommended) complete with personalised wooden name plate hung over the garden gate "Villa H****r"! What a nice touch! We were then treated to a complimentary welcome foot massage which was blissful, and the bed had been decorated with rose petals, and flowers all over the villa in honour of our honeymoon.
reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The villa was even nicer than the pictures on the Pavilions website! Very private, no chance of anyone seeing in from the outside - truly a no-tan-lines place (if it wasn't for the steady stream of housekeeping, pool cleaner, gardener etc paying visits throughout the day - we didn't discover the Do Not Disturb wooden carving to hang on the gate til the last day!). The living / dining area was large and very comfortable with a double chaise longue, DVD player (we used as a CD player), loads of double doors to throw open for fresh air in the mornings, ceiling fans and mood lighting. The gallon water cooler in the kitchenette was a nice touch, no need to buy bottled water.
reviews.title: A wonderful discovery

likes.liked: — The calm and sense of privacy, the beauty and the excellent value provided!
likes.disliked: — The lack of smoke detectors in the villa, the inexperienced staff and the poor Internet connection

reviews.title: Paradise
reviews.text: The bedroom was spacious and the bed was wonderfully large and comfortable, the air con was limited to the bedroom but that worked perfectly as you really felt the benefit when you entered!
